metadata.name: I. SOUND OF WATER
metadata.description:
THE COLLECTION

The first of XXII PROJECT + THE MESSAGE.

This collection clearly displays twenty-two art projects with three works chosen and selected from them, all released in the last eight years of SIERMOND's career. Combined in a series they give life to the essence of the message. The observer, upon seeing and reading them, is inundated with mysticism and romanticism. Energy generates a deep unconscious knowledge that resonates within our Aura giving them a new vision.

Welcome to the initiatory path of evolution of your Aura.

UTILITY

The first buyer receives:  
- The work printed and signed with dedication in A3 format  
- One work of your choice among the three depicted in a limited edition 1 of 3  
- An hour of consulting with visionary artist SIERMOND in the Metaverse.

The remaining buyers:  
- The work printed in A3 format
